name: overtaking
content:

the act of coming from behind another vehicle or person and moving in front of it or them: A quarter of the drivers surveyed did not recognize the "no overtaking" sign. Hamilton pulled off a great overtaking manoeuvre down the outside.
More examplesFewer examplesOn narrow country roads, overtaking can be difficult.The yellow flag means "caution - no overtaking".Overtaking is so rare in Formula One that even a fumbled attempt to pass can be cause for celebration.
